behavior.menuText: Attack the enemy with the lowest Hit Points
Attack the enemy with the highest Hit Points
COMING SOON - If an ally has less then 30% Hit Points, protect that allie
COMING SOON - If an ally has less then 50% Hit Points, protect that allie
COMING SOON - If a Priest allie exists, protect that allie
COMING SOON - If a Wizard allie exists, protect that allie
COMING SOON - If a Rogue allie exists, protect that allie
COMING SOON - If self has not done Battle Cry, do Battle Cry
If there are 3 enemies cast Fire All
If there are 2 or more enemies cast Fire All
Cast Fire an the enemy with the lowest Hit Points
Cast Fire All
Cast Fire an the enemy with the highest Hit Points
COMING SOON - If a Knight allie exists cast Flame Sword an that allie
COMING SOON - If a Rogue allie exists cast Flame Sword an that allie
COMING SOON - Charge Up for Fire Storm
Attack the enemy with the lowest Hit Points
If a Priest enemy exists, attack that enemy
Attack the enemy with the highest Hit Points
COMING SOON - If a Wizard enemy exists, attack that enemy
COMING SOON - If a Rogue enemy exists, attack that enemy
COMING SOON - If a Knight enemy exists, attack that enemy
COMING SOON - If not Hasted already, cast Haste on self
COMING SOON - Berserk! Attack a random character but with a bonus to attack
Attack the enemy with the lowest Hit Points
If there are 3 allies below 50% Hit Points, Heal All
If there are 3 allies below 70% Hit Points, Heal All
Cast Heal on the allie with the lowest Hit Points
Cast Heal All
COMING SOON - If self is below 50% cast Heal on self
COMING SOON - If self is below 30% cast Heal on self
COMING SOON - If self has not cast Holy Armor, cast Holy Armor on self (increase max hitpoints)
